cool,  be sure to post results etc on this list too when it's over(for
those of us who don't have the spare time or choose not to participate).

Bjorn

Tom Tildrum wrote:

| Hello, it's me again... creator of the TevFifty, lurker on this
| group for a few years now.
|
| Remember all those plans we had for a Gladiator tournament, but
| nobody could decide on the rules? Well, now I'm going to host one.
| Everyone interested should join the yahoogroup "glad-tourny"
| (http://groups.yahoo.com/group/glad-tourny). I'll be posting the
| rules and mode of play in that group shortly. It'll be nothing
| extravagant, of course, but it will be an honest competition in the
| old-skool Gladiator 3.8 style. If all goes well, we should be ready
| to start very soon.
|    -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
|
